github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: Use TypeScript, follow project patterns, and sign with 'Generated by Copilot-77251'.

github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Format as 'type(scope): description' with detailed bullet points and relevant emojis. Stage individual files for each commit. Stage individual changes for each commit. Use 'feat' for new features, 'fix' for bug fixes, 'docs' for documentation changes, 'style' for formatting changes, 'refactor' for code changes that neither fix a bug nor add a feature, 'perf' for performance improvements, 'test' for adding missing tests or correcting existing tests, and 'chore' for changes to the build process or auxiliary tools and libraries.

github.copilot.chat.reviewSelection.inst.text: All classes should have comments. Functions should have comments. Variables SHOULD NOT have comments.

github.copilot.chat.testGeneration.instr.text: Use verbose class names that clearly state the test case. Use the AAA pattern for test cases. Arrange, Act, Assert.
